original: Ihlenius, Karl Gunnar August, stadsombudsman, Varberg, f. 23/10/06 i Nossebro, Skarab. 1., av bankdir. Oscar Hansson o. Signe Berg. G. 36 m. Barbro Elofsdotter Nordlindh. Barn : Eva-Nad-ta f. 39, Krister 40, Elisabeth 44. — Stud:ex. i Skara 25, s tud. i Upps. 25, jur. kand. 32. Tings-tjg. i Ase, Viste, Barne o. Laske 32-35, not. v. driätselkans!l. i Upps. 3’7, stadsomb :man i Lidköp. 38, dito i Varberg sed. 39, e. rådm. där sed. 45.
translated: Ihlenius, Karl Gunnar August, city official, Varberg, born on October 23, 1906 in Nossebro, Skaraborg County, son of bank director Oscar Hansson and Signe Berg. Married in 1936 to Barbro Elofsdotter Nordlindh. Children: Eva-Nad-ta (born 1939), Krister (born 1940), Elisabeth (born 1944). He graduated from high school in Skara in 1925 and studied in Uppsala in 1925, graduating with a law degree in 1932. He worked as a clerk in various districts including Ase, Viste, Barne and Laske from 1932-1935 and worked as a notary public in Uppsala in 1937. He served as a city official in Lidköping in 1938 and in Varberg from 1939, becoming a councilor there in 1945.
